title: Stock Futures Drop in Volatile Trading
sub_head: Technology stocks were particularly hard hit before the opening bell after Snap issued a profit warning
body:
U.S. stock futures fell, putting the S&P 500 on track to flirt with bear market territory again.
Futures for the S&P 500 fell 1.4% Tuesday, while those for the Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 1%. Contracts for the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 slid 2%.
